description:
You're in the market for a preamplifier for TV to boost your antenna signal?

Television's Long Range Preamplifiers are perfect for those who live in rural areas with weaker signals. This preamplifier for TV will amplify any antenna or radio signals that are more than 80 miles away, so you'll be able to enjoy all of your favorite shows and movies without any interruptions.

If you want to make sure that you can watch all of your favorite programs without interruption, then this product is perfect for you! It will help ensure that no matter where your broadcast towers are located, they won't be too far away from home.

The best part about it is that installation is easy - just plug it into an outlet and connect the coaxial cable from the wall jack to the input on the preamplifier. That's it! Your signal should now be amplified by up to 10 times its original strength.
name: Pre-Amplifiers
